name: clockmate
description: Browser Erweiterung für Chromium und Firefox, welche die Überstunden bzw. ein Gleitzeitkonto direkt in der Fiori-Zeiterfassung anzeigt.

scripts.build: npm run transpileBuildScripts && node scripts/build-prepare-folders-and-files.js && npm run bundleExtension && node scripts/build-fix-manifests.js && npm run zipExtensions
scripts.bundleExtension: npm run bundleExtension:webWorker && npm run bundleExtension:popup && npm run bundleExtension:offscreen && npm run bundleExtension:settings && esbuild src/extension/contentscript/contentscript.ts --bundle --outfile=build/extension/contentscript/clockmate.js && esbuild src/extension/backgroundscript/backgroundscript.ts --bundle --outfile=build/extension/backgroundscript/backgroundscript.js
scripts.bundleExtension:settings: ejs src/extension/settings/index.ejs -o build/extension/settings/settings.html && ejs src/extension/settings/privacy-policy.ejs -o build/extension/settings/privacy-policy.html && npx @tailwindcss/cli --input src/extension/settings/settings.css --output build/extension/settings/settings.css --minify && esbuild src/extension/settings/settings.ts --bundle --outfile=build/extension/settings/settings.js

author: NilsPvR
